Text: FERC Open Meeting Recently AnnouncedCapitol Connection is pleased to announce that it will broadcast the recently announced Federal Energy Regulatory Commission Open Meeting on Monday June pm EDT This meeting will be broadcast via the Capitol Connections television system in the Washington DC as well as via the internet and telephone bridge The Capitol Connection is pleased to announce that it will also broadcast the previously announced Federal Energy Regulatory Commission Open Meetings on Wednesday June am EDT Wednesday June am EDT The technical conference on Tuesday June am EDT Will be broadcast via the internet and phone bridge only Meeting dates and times are subject to change without notice For current information you can go to our website at wwwcapitolconnectionorg for a link to the FERCs page or you can go to the FERCs web page at wwwfercfedus The FERC Office of the Secretary can be reached at The Capitol Connection also offers FERC meetings live via the Internet as well as via Phone Bridge and satellite please visit our website at wwwcapitolconnectionorg or send email to for more information If there is a meeting you are interested in receiving please call David Reininger Shirley AlJarani or Julia Morelli at
